sentences.sContent: To increase the overall probability of success, divide a behavior into parts and learn each part successively.
sentences.sContent_eng: To increase the overall probability of success, divide a behavior into parts and learn each part successively.
sentences.sCn: 为以增加总体成功的可能性，可以把一个行为分成若干个部分并相继地学习每一个部分。

words.tran: 连续的；继承的；依次的；接替的
